1.definition: The outer edge of the eye, where the top and bottom eyelids meet the eyeball.

2.definition: The meeting point of the upper eyelid and the eyeball halfway between landmarks 3 and 26.

3.definition: The highest meeting point of the upper eyelid and the eyeball.

4.definition: The meeting point of the upper eyelid and the eyeball half way between landmarks 3 and 17.

5.definition: The inner edge of the eye, where the top and bottom eyelids meet the eyeball, on the inner edge of the tear duct.

6.definition: The meeting point of the iris and the sclera (white part) which is closest to the nose bridge.

7.definition: The meeting point of the pupil and the iris which is closest to the nose bridge.

9.definition: The lowest meeting point of the pupil and the iris.

10.definition: The meeting point of the pupil and the iris which is furthest away from the nose bridge.

11.definition: The meeting point of the iris and the sclera which is furthest away from the nose bridge.

12.definition: The meeting point of the lower eyelid and the eyeball directly below 2.

13.definition: The lowest meeting point of the iris and the sclera.

14.definition: The meeting point of the lower eyelid and the eyeball directly below 4.

15.definition: The meeting point of the lower eyelid and the eyeball directly below 17.

16.definition: Another mark of the eye's inner edge, more external than landmark 5. This mark should be on the external edge of the tear duct.

17.definition: The meeting point of the upper eyelid and the eyeball, halfway between landmarks 4 and 5.

18.definition: A point on the bottom inner edge of the iris and the sclera. This point should be at 30° angle to the horizontal line.

19.definition: The meeting point of the upper eyelid and the eyeball directly below 3.

20.definition: A point on the bottom outer edge of the iris and the sclera. This point should be at 30° angle to the horizontal line.

21.definition: The meeting point of the lower eyelid and the eyeball directly below 26.

22.definition: A point on the bottom outer edge of the pupil and the iris. This point should be at 30° angle to the horizontal line.

23.definition: A point on the upper outer edge of the pupil and the iris. This point should be at 30° angle to the horizontal line.

24.definition: A point on the upper inner edge of the pupil and the iris. This point should be at 30° angle to the horizontal line.

25.definition: A point on the bottom inner edge of the pupil and the iris. This point should be at 30° angle to the horizontal line.

26.definition: The meeting point of the upper eyelid and the eyeball, halfway between landmarks 1 and 2.

27.definition: Another mark of the eye's outer edge, more external than landmark 1. Where the line of eyelashes on the top and bottom eyelids meets.
